attributes.action: Round up and intern ALL members of Sinn Fein.
attributes.additional_details: If politicians 'withdraw their support' for the police services they are effectively putting themselves outside of the law.  As self declared outlaws they can legitimately be rounded up and incarcerated where they are not a danger to the people (perhaps we can get Gitmo' to take them).  It is also an option to put them all in uniform and send them as a vanguard NATO battalion to the 3rd World War Front developing in the Ukraine.
